Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface IUserMenuView

All Superinterfaces:
IMenuView
All Known Implementing Classes:
CampCommitteeView, StaffView, StudentView
public interface IUserMenuView extends IMenuView
The IUserMenuView interface defines a contract for the user main menu options and relevant views it requires.
